tool_description: Retrieves music streaming data from digital platforms including play counts, revenue, geographic distribution, and user engagement metrics for specified time periods.

connection_id.description: Connection ID from Platform Connection Manager

track_identifiers.description: Array of track ISRCs or platform-specific IDs

data_granularity.description: Data aggregation level: daily, weekly, monthly

error_messages: Invalid connection: Connection ID is invalid or expired. Establish new connection using Platform Connection Manager.
Date range error: Start date must be before end date and within platform's data retention period.
Track limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 tracks per request. Split large requests into multiple calls.
Unsupported granularity: Use daily, weekly, or monthly for data_granularity parameter.
usage: Provide connection_id from established platform connection, track_identifiers array, and date range. Configure data_granularity and optional geographic/demographic inclusion as needed.

total_plays.description: Total number of plays across all tracks and time period

usage_records.description: Array of detailed usage record strings
